title: Microsoft Releases Patch for SMB Vulnerability
description: Microsoft releases security bulletin MS17-010, a patch for a vulnerability in the server message block (SMB) protocol used by Windows.

title: Shadow Brokers Leak EternalBlue
description: The hacking group known as the Shadow Brokers leaks EternalBlue, an exploit developed by the NSA that takes advantage of the SMB vulnerability.

title: WannaCry Ransomware Starts Spreading
description: The WannaCry ransomware attack starts spreading across computers worldwide, encrypting files and demanding a Bitcoin ransom.

title: NHS Reports WannaCry Infections
description: The UK's National Health Service (NHS) reports that its systems are being infected by WannaCry, disrupting healthcare services.

title: Kill Switch Found
description: Marcus Hutchins, a cybersecurity researcher, discovers a kill switch in the WannaCry code, slowing the spread of the ransomware.

title: Global Impact Assessed
description: Over a week since the initial attack, it's estimated that WannaCry affected over 200,000 computers in 150 countries, causing billions in damages.
